KADE maxArcade - USB/HID Joystick 2 Player with Analog (Beta)

pin Function
D00 Player 1 - D-Pad Up
D01 Player 1 - D-Pad Down
D02 Player 1 - D-Pad Left
D03 Player 1 - D-Pad Right
D04 Player 1 - Button 1
D05 Player 1 - Button 2
D06 Player 1 - Button 3
D07 Player 1 - Button 4
D08 Player 1 - Button 5
D09 Player 1 - Button 6
D10 Player 1 - Button 7
D11 Player 1 - Button 8
D12 Player 1 - Button 9
D13 Player 1 - Button 10
D14 Player 1 - Button 11
D15 Player 1 - Button 12
D16 Player 1 - Button 13
D17 Player 1 - Button 14
D18 Player 1 - Button 15
D19 Player 2 - D-Pad Up
D20 Player 2 - D-Pad Down
D21 Player 2 - D-Pad Left
D22 Player 2 - D-Pad Right
D23 Player 2 - Button 1
D24 Player 2 - Button 2
D25 Player 2 - Button 3
D26 Player 2 - Button 4
D27 Player 2 - Button 5
D28 Player 2 - Button 6
D29 Player 2 - Button 7
D30 Player 2 - Button 8
D31 Player 2 - Button 9
D32 Player 2 - Button 10
D33 Player 2 - Button 11
D34 Player 2 - Button 12
D35 Player 2 - Button 13
D36 Player 2 - Button 14
A00 Player 1 - Analog Axis 1 (Left Stick X)
A01 Player 1 - Analog Axis 2 (Left Stick Y)
A02 Player 1 - Analog Axis 3 (Right Stick X)
A03 Player 1 - Analog Axis 4 (Right Stick Y)
A04 Player 2 - Analog Axis 1
A05 Player 2 - Analog Axis 2
A06 Player 2 - Analog Axis 3
A07 Player 2 - Analog Axis 4
